tool_description: The robots.txt analysis API provides an efficient solution for examining and understanding robots.txt files on the web, streamlining the management of crawling directives.
name: Robots SEO Analyzer
title: Robots SEO Analyzer

api_list.name: allowed
api_list.description: Returns true if crawling the specified URL is allowed for the specified user-agent.

api_list.name: crawlDelay
api_list.description: Get the crawl delay by user agent. If crawlDelay is null there is no crawl delay for the specified user agent.

optional_parameters.name: ua
optional_parameters.description: If not present is '*' by default.

api_list.name: sitemaps
api_list.description: Return the list of sitemaps that are specified in robots.txt file.

api_list.name: robots
api_list.description: Get raw robots data from a website.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: It's recommended to encode the URL or it could be problems
